title: These Ukrainian Drones Don’t Just Kill. They Deliver Oatmeal Cookies.
summary_full: In a war where drones are synonymous with destruction, some are also used to drop care packages to Ukraine’s frontline soldiers.
summary_public: In a war where drones are synonymous with destruction, some are also used to drop care packages to Ukraine’s frontline soldiers.

UA.label: positive
